item.title: Binding to a table view with multiple cells and sections
item.description: One of the questions that keeps popping up in the RxSwift Slack channel for years now is how to display multiple cell types when binding data to a table view. This is actually very easy to do and in this post I’ll show you two distinct ways to display multiple cells in a table view (and it works identically for collection views if that’s what you’re looking for).
